
### Data Set

The data set for this assignment is called **`msleep`**. See the [msleep documentation](https://ggplot2.tidyverse.org/reference/msleep.html) for more info.

```{r}

rm(list = ls())

library(tidyverse) 


```

```{r}

Q1 <- cor.test(msleep$sleep_total, msleep$bodywt)

Q1

```

```{r}

sleep_copy = data_frame(msleep)
Q2 <- sleep_copy |>
  select("sleep_total","sleep_rem","brainwt","bodywt") |>
  na.omit()|>
  cor() |>
  round(2)

Q2

```

```{r}

Q3 <- lm(bodywt ~ vore, data = msleep)$coefficients
Q3 <- round(Q3, 2)
Q3

```

```{r}

filtered_data <- filter(msleep, vore != "omni" & vore != "insecti")

filtered_data <- mutate(filtered_data, vorebin = ifelse(vore == 'carni', 0, 1))

Q4 <- glm(vorebin ~ sleep_total, data = filtered_data, family = binomial)

summary(Q4)

```
